summary: The implementation successfully delivers comprehensive video and course settings editors with validation, thumbnail/image upload support, and a personalized course recommendations section. The backend provides a recommendation API that considers user activity (watch history, likes, comments, channel follows). All requirements appear to be implemented with appropriate validation, access control, and UI feedback.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) that handles data schema migration including adding viewCount field to videos
hallucinated_features.reason: No migration or schema evolution was requested in the BuildRequest. The requirements focused on editors and recommendations, not data migration.

hallucinated_features.description: Course visibility toggle (isVisible field) in course settings editor
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 mentions 'visibility settings' but the BuildRequest acceptance criteria specify 'visibility, pricing, and tier requirements' without defining what visibility means. The implementation added an isVisible boolean toggle, which may be a reasonable interpretation but goes beyond explicit requirements.
